name: On Shore
description:
Restore a destroyed river by returning the washed up fish, you may need to sacrifice something to restore more...

The message I wanted to present within my game, the message of sacrifice surrounding looking at the past at what our ancestors/indigenous did and sacrificing ourselves/by-product for the betterment of the earth.

This was supposed to be a full game, which technically it is, but it will feel unfinished. This was one of those projects that fell through after I realised my concept didn't work entirely. I was focused on the message, which I still think is very powerful and could still be done, but with my limitations and development knowledge I was not able to achieve what I wanted. Although this game did not come to fruition I think it's important to show poor attempts too.

Credits

Music: Kevin MacLeod

Death Sphere: ミノカズヤ
